# Government Tender Announcement

**Business Consulting / Change Management Services**

## Title and Announcement Details

* **English Title:** Business Consulting / Change Management Services for Evaluation Priorities of the 9-8-8: Suicide Crisis Helpline Funding Program
* **French Title:** Services-conseils en affaires et services de gestion du changement pour mener à bien les priorités immédiates pour le programme de financement du 9-8-8  : Ligne d’aide en cas de suicide
* **Reference Number:** cb-401-44454326 (Ukraine)

## Timeline and Requirements

* **Publication Date:** February 27, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 18, 2024 @ 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

## Business Requirements

As per the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC), we are seeking expertise in business consulting and change management services to support the evaluation of priorities for the 9-8-8: Suicide Crisis Helpline funding program. The priorities will focus on providing a more effective and efficient crisis response for individuals experiencing a mental health crisis.

We will require service providers to demonstrate expertise in the areas of:

* Analytical thinking and problem-solving
* Communication and stakeholder management
* Change management and implementation
* Project management and delivery

## Tender Process

The Government of Canada will adopt a competitive and selective tendering process to award the most suitable service provider. Responses to this tender announcement should be submitted electronically through the Canada Buys platform.

For more information, please refer to the attachment provided (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33030/solutions-based-npp-%28en---1000255006.pdf).
